content.question: Which of the following is an example of affirmative action?

choices.label: The president submits a report to Congress forty-eight hours after he deployed troops in an overseas conflict.
The United States Department of Education offers low-interest college student loans to all financially qualified students.
A business actively recruits qualified minorities, women, and persons with disabilities in order to be eligible for work with the national government.
The state of Virginia awards an infrastructure contract to the company with the lowest bid.

content.answer: A business actively recruits qualified minorities, women, and persons with disabilities in order to be eligible for work with the national government.
